Question: Shenzhen Source Creative Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification

Product Highlights at CES 2024

 - Party Speakers
 - Wood Speakers
 - Portable Bluetooth Speakers
 - Retro Radios
 - Soundbars

Features of Products

 - Integration of sales, production, and design
 - Specialization in multiple types of Bluetooth speakers
 - Focus on consumer electronics and innovative technologies

(Note: The mention of Govee and generative AI is related to a different company and not relevant to Shenzhen Source Creative Technology Co., Ltd's product summary.)
